name: Italian Chicken Pesto Pot Pie
description: Use Bisquick® Gluten Free mix and leftover chicken to get this tasty pot pie on the table in only 35 minutes.
recipeIngredient: 1  medium red bell pepper, chopped (1 cup)
1  can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes with basil, garlic and oregano, undrained
1  cup gluten free shredded Parmesan cheese (4 oz)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 350°F. In ungreased 2-quart microwavable casserole, mix chicken, bell pepper, tomatoes, 1 tablespoon Bisquick mix, the salt and pepper. Cover with microwavable plastic wrap. Microwave on High 3 to 4 minutes or until bubbly.

In small bowl, stir 3/4 cup Bisquick mix, 1/2 cup of the cheese, the milk, egg and pesto until well blended. Drop mixture by small spoonfuls over chicken mixture. Sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup cheese.
Bake uncovered 25 minutes or until cheese begins to turn golden brown.
